title: Client Store Not Working?
body:
Is the client store bugged or is it just having issues? I'm trying to get my RP purchases in so I can give a few things to a couple friends for the holidays.
But I can't click on anything, I can change the Tabs, from Gifting Center on down but nothing comes up, Just the blueish screen with a small rectangle. (Shown in my Print Screen)
And the Purchase RP Tab doesn't open at all.
Any Ideas other then continuing to restart and open my client. (Which doesn't seem to be helping)
Hopefully this is fixed soon. :(
